snoopy.blindnote: SNORA7B is encoded in RPL32 pseud gene. SNORA7A is encoded in RPL32 gene. SNORA7B is a close paralogue of SNORA7A. (20100630末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20111201吉浜)ホスト遺伝子の塩基配列と構造をRPGを参考に変更しました。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807, Ofengand, J., and Bakin, A. (1997). Mapping to nucleotide resolution of pseudouridine residues in large subunit ribosomal RNAs from representative eukaryotes, prokaryotes, archaebacteria, mitochondria and chloroplasts. J Mol Biol 266, 246-268, Schmitz, J., Zemann, A., Churakov, G., Kuhl, H., Grutzner, F., Reinhardt, R., Brosius, J. (2008) Retroposed SNOfall--A mammalian-wide comparison of platypus snoRNAs. Genome Res. May 7.
